committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia

official_title: To provide for enhanced retirement benefits for administrative law judges.
short_title: Administrative Law Judges Retirement Act of 2007
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Administrative Law Judges Retirement Act of 2007 - Sets forth separate provisions governing Government and employee contributions, annuity eligibility requirements (ten years of service and age 60), early retirement, and annuity computation (2.5% and 1.7%, respectively, of average pay for each year of service) for administrative law judges under the Civil Service Retirement System and the Federal Employees' Retirement System.

titles.title: Administrative Law Judges Retirement Act of 2007
To provide for enhanced retirement benefits for administrative law judges.
